info.name: Dark Twitter Navbar
info.description:
Re-colours the new Twitter navbar to a dark colour. Allows the loading gif to work unlike some of the other userstyles.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/dq56highhiy5dg2/twitter-navbar.png

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/9wcq4v3r1trswrq/twitter-navbar-loading-gif.png
